participant_abstract.sent: This meeting brought together the initial individual work of the two designers and marketing expert.
Each presented their ideas on working design, technical functions design and functional design respectively - presentations can be found in the project documents folder.
Discussion followed, the result of which was a decision on target group and functionality.

participant_actions.sent: PM: liaise with management, keep team updated.
All to consider implications/feasibility of incorporating voice recognition and keep our target group in mind when designing.

participant_decisions.sent: Voice recognition (concerned that this may turn out to be too complex and management may worry about time to launch implications).

participant_problems.sent: No real problems, I should have forwarded the email with new information sooner to allow the others to prepare better, but they coped well.
